nodes.Description:
CAPEC-507: Physical Theft
An adversary gains physical access to a system or device through theft of the
item. Possession of a system or device enables a number of unique attacks to be
executed and often provides the adversary with an extended timeframe for which
to perform an attack. Most protections put in place to secure sensitive
information can be defeated when an adversary has physical access and enough
time.
nodes.label: Physical Theft
